name: Plastic World
description:
Plastic World is a fun, short, 3rd Person view Adventure game I made in 48 hours for the Timdred GameJam 2019 | Theme: Point of no Return

----------

Controls: W, A, S, D, Left thumbstick = Movement

                      LShift, Left thumbstickbutton = Sprint

                      Spacebar, (Controller) A/X = Jump

                      Mouse, Right thumbstick = Look
